description: As Japan reopens its borders, the Hokkaido resort town is rebranding itself as a year-round destination for both foreign and domestic tourists. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Japan’s Niseko gears up for ‘tourism explosion’
title_page: Japan’s Niseko gears up for ‘tourism explosion’ | The Straits Times
maintext:
NISEKO, Hokkaido – The dark winter that has befallen Niseko with the dearth of foreign tourists amid the Covid-19 pandemic is almost over, given the pent-up demand that is likely to be unleashed with the reopening of Japan’s borders in time for winter.
Niseko has won a reputation among winter sports enthusiasts for its powder snow, being described as the Aspen of the East, though it has long been more popular with foreigners than Japanese.
